TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlReaderSettings extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 实现指定处理规则或选项设置。

span.span: Specifies processing rules or option settings for a implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，已初始化的 对象使用对应于所需默认值的属性的值，例如， `false` 对于布尔属性或引用类型属性的 null 值。By default, an initialized object uses values for its properties that correspond to expected defaults, such as `false` for Boolean properties or null values for reference-type properties. 默认初始化会生成以下值：Default initialization results in the following values: - 和 属性为 `null` 。The and properties are `null`. - 属性为 `false`。The property is `false`. - 该 属性位于 `false` 对象模型中; 但是，它可以在 `true` 运行时根据加载的可执行文件及其调试设置或 XAML 架构上下文设置为。The property is `false` in the object model; however, it can be set to `true` at run time based on the loaded executables and their debug settings, or by XAML schema context.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: An existing object.

summary.span: 基于另一个 对象中的值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class based on values in another object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数支持 XAML 读取器设置的合并，其中其他设置也可以来自读取器进程中的其他参与者。This constructor supports the merging of settings for XAML readers where additional settings can also come from other participants in the reader process.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示根对象在报告 XAML 类型表示形式时是否可包括具有受保护代码访问模型的成员。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the root object may include members that have a protected code access model when it reports the XAML type representation.

value.span: 如果根对象可包括具有受保护代码访问模型的成员，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the root object may include members that have a protected code access model; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此设置与一些 XAML 实现（如 WPF）相关，其中，根对象通常是 "工厂"，用于从模式类型生成实例，而该模式类型并非始终是实际的对象实例。This setting is relevant to some XAML implementations such as WPF where the root object is often a "factory" for generating an instance from a pattern type, when that pattern type is not always a practical object instance. 例如，的根 `UserControl` 具有特定的 WPF 和 Silverlight 应用程序模型含义，并且 `UserControl` 可能具有 () 的受保护属性， `UserControl.Content` 分析器需要访问该属性。For example, a root of `UserControl` has a certain meaning for WPF and Silverlight application models, and `UserControl` might have protected properties (`UserControl.Content`) that the parser needs access to. 工具和设计图面还需要访问此类属性。Tools and design surfaces also need access to such properties. 通常应将这些事例报告给 XAML 类型系统作为可写属性，即使它们在后备类型系统中具有受保护的访问权限。These cases should generally be reported to the XAML type system as writable properties even though they have protected access in the backing type system.

The base URI to use.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework XAML 服务 API 中的一些 URI 相关属性将 XAML 命名空间的 Uri 视为字符串;但是，此属性使用 true 类型。Some URI-related properties in the .NET Framework XAML Services API treat URIs for XAML namespaces as strings; however, this property uses the true type.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 XAML 读取器是否应忽略存在于属性元素上的 特性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the XAML reader should ignore values for attributes that exist on property elements.

value.span: 如果读取器应忽略属性元素 特性的值，则为 。

span.span: if the reader should ignore values for attributes on property elements.

value.span: 如果读取器应处理属性元素的 特性，则为 。

span.span: if the reader should process attributes on property elements.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在本地化过程中， `x:Uid` 特性用于标识标记中的元素，以便本地化工具可以将 XAML 元素作为离散实体处理以进行本地化。During localization, the `x:Uid` attribute is used to identify elements in markup so that localization tools can process XAML elements as discrete entities for localization. 特性通常不会出现在 XAML 中的属性元素上。Attributes do not usually appear on property elements in XAML. 但是， `x:Uid` 这是一个异常，因为某些使用情况将本地化文本作为内容放置在属性元素中，而不是作为可以接收自己的单独对象 `x:Uid` 。However, `x:Uid` is an exception because some usages put localized text in a property element as content, instead of as a separate object that can receive its own `x:Uid`. 设置 值以 `true` 启用更严格的模式。Setting an value to `true` enables a stricter mode. 的默认值将 `false` 继续处理属性元素 `x:Uid` 特性。The default value of `false` continues to process property element `x:Uid` attributes.
